other_tests.findings: Missense mutation K330E identified in PLG gene; no mutations in F12 gene.
c.988A>G transition causing a missense mutation changing codon AAA for Lys to GAA for Glu at amino acid residue 330.
An additional abnormal band visible in Patient 1 and Patient 2.
Angioedema attacks terminated completely except for one during treatment.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Prophylactic administration led to almost complete inhibition of attacks.

other_tests.findings: Performed due to severe tongue swelling and airway obstruction.
